about_the_game:
Mordath is a singleplayer horror game, Figure out why you are here and get back home!

WHY AM I HERE?!


You play as Jerry, a young man who has gotten into a terrible car accident on his way to visit his parents, Jerry finds himself transported back in time to an eerie and abandoned place.

As you explore the desolated world and abandoned places, you'll soon realize that you're not alone. Strange, malevolent creatures roam the shadows, and you'll need to use all of your wits and courage to survive.

As you delve deeper into the mystery of the world, you'll uncover clues about how to get home. But be careful - the further you dig, the more dangerous the world becomes. Can you solve the mystery and find your way back home, or will you become a victim of the town's horrifying secrets?

MECHANICS AND GAMEPLAY


Mordath has a lot of different mechanics, some are new and some have already been seen in other games. Mordath focuses a lot on its gameplay and for it to be satisfying for its costumers. Please add suggestions in the discord if you feel like it!

  • Survival mechanics
Players must carefully manage their resources, including food, water, and medical supplies, in order to stay alive in the harsh environment of Mordath.

  • Mordath has a vast, open world to explore
Players can roam the abandoned town of Mordath and discover its many secrets, including hidden passageways, clues, and collectibles.

  • There is wide variety of enemies
Players will face off against a variety of terrifying creatures, each with their own unique abilities and weaknesses.

  • A deep, immersive story
Mordath is filled with complex characters, intriguing plot twists, and a rich lore that players can uncover as they progress through the game.

  • Multiple endings Players
choices and actions throughout the game will influence the outcome of their story, leading to different endings depending on their playstyle.

CREATURES AND BOSSES


In Mordath, players will encounter a variety of monsters as they explore the abandoned town. These creatures are the twisted, corrupted remnants of the town's former inhabitants, and they will stop at nothing to prevent the player from uncovering the truth.

In addition to these regular enemies, players will also face off against several powerful bosses throughout their journey. These bosses are formidable opponents that will require all of the player's skill and cunning to defeat.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains, blood, gore and violence, If you are too young or sensitive about stuff like this, Do NOT play. I repeat do NOT play!
